user_query: I'm organizing a company event and need to track the package containing the promotional materials. Can you provide me with the tracking details for the UPS, USPS, and FedEx packages? Also, fetch the fleet information and logo of Singapore Airlines to inspire our travel arrangements.

TaskList.description: Fetch tracking details for the UPS package.
Fetch tracking details for the USPS package.
Fetch tracking details for the FedEx package.
Fetch fleet information of Singapore Airlines.
